snippet.title: Persona 5 Funkin' In Starlight [Full Mod Showcase]
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD THE MOD: https://gamebanana.com/mods/566581

Hello! It's been a lil' bit but I'm finally able to show off this mod. It's been in on and off development for like a year or so and it's been something I've really been looking forward to getting my stuff out for. Originally I was brought on by Ito to do the Persona 3 styled song and ended up not only doing 2 more songs for the mod (the Persona 4 one and the menu music) but also helping out with coding, UI, and animation stuff. Most of the menu stuff that replicates the style or certain menus from Persona 5 was done by me and it was really fun figuring out how to recreate this stuff and make shaders for all the effects. I've always been a big Persona fan and I've haven't really seen a Friday Night Funkin' mod that was mostly original music as opposed to covers of pre-existing Persona music yet. Anyways, I hope you all enjoy this lil' mod and I look forward to showing off everything else I've got planned for this year in due time. 

:]

Chapters:
0:00 - Title
0:13 - "Facade" by Case
3:39 - "Full Moon" by Rozebud
6:11 - "Mayonaka" by Rozebud
8:58 - Results
9:15 - Extras

#fnf #persona
